are_you_sure_you_want_to_end_the_game_d9.message: Are you sure you want to end the game?

all_players_will_be_taken_back_to_the_ga.message: All players will be taken back to the game description and a new game can be started.

intercept_the_enemy_s_battle_plans_to_wi.message:
Intercept the enemy''s battle plans to win the decisive victory, but
      beware the double agents that strive to sabotage our efforts.

intercept_is_a_game_for_5_to_10_players_.message: Intercept is a game for 5 to 10 players.

the_game_goes_through_up_to_5_missions_f.message:
The game goes through up to 5 missions. For each mission a team is
        selected by the round-robin chosen leader. The rest of the team votes
        to approve or reject the team, to make sure the right operatives are
        sent. If the team is rejected, the next leader will propose a new team.
        Once the team is approved, double agents will try to sabotage the
        mission while avoiding detection.

the_game_ends_when_either_3_mission_succ.message:
The game ends when either 3 mission succeeded, or 3 missions failed.
        The enemy will also immediately win if the proposed mission teams are
        rejected 5 times in a row.

can_you_send_the_right_operatives_to_int.message:
Can you send the right operatives to intercept the enemy''s plans? Or
        will your armies be destroyed by superior intel?

indecision_kept_the_team_from_intercepti.message:
Indecision kept the team from intercepting vital enemy messages.
          Double Agents win.

the_double_agents_successfully_sabotaged.message:
The Double Agents successfully sabotaged the interception of enemy
          messages. Double Agents win.

the_team_of_spies_successfully_intercept.message:
The team of Spies successfully intercepted the enemy messages,
          avoiding disruption from the Double Agents. Spies win.

you_have_been_tasked_with_intercepting_s.message:
You have been tasked with intercepting strategic enemy intel. The most
        difficult part of your job will be decerning which of your fellow spies
        is actually working for your enemy.

you_should_always_include_yourself_to_go.message:
You should always include yourself to go on missions you lead, since
        you are the only one you can trust completely.

the_fools_around_you_have_no_idea_that_t.message:
The fools around you have no idea that they are your true enemy. With
        your cunning, you will sabotage this group so that your superior nation
        can justly conquer.

do_not_let_anyone_besides_your_fellow_do.message:
Do not let anyone besides your fellow double agents know where your
        real allegiance lies. Act in every way as a normal spy, until you can
        sabotage an interception.

you_are_a_triple_agent_the_double_agents.message:
You are a Triple Agent. The Double Agents think you are one of them,
        and you must use this to your advantage. The Spies also rightly think
        you are one of them, don''t let them down.

pretend_to_be_a_double_agent_but_be_very.message:
Pretend to be a Double Agent, but be very careful, you only win if the
        missions are successful.

there_are_count_number_double_agents_in_.message: There are { count, number } Double Agents in this game.

here_are_your_fellow_double_agents_c1b18.message: Here are your fellow Double Agents:

as_a_double_agent_you_need_to_sabotage_m.message:
As a Double Agent, you need to sabotage missions to win, but you
            may successfully intercept the message if needed to keep the trust
            of the others.

you_have_successfully_completed_your_mis.message: You have successfully completed your mission.

as_a_mole_you_need_to_intercept_messages.message:
As a Mole, you need to intercept messages to win, but you may
            sabotage the mission if needed to keep the trust of the double
            agents.

as_a_spy_you_need_to_intercept_messages_.message:
As a Spy, you need to intercept messages to win, you cannot
            sabotage the mission.

please_wait_while_your_comrades_complete.message: Please wait while your comrades complete their assignment.

you_are_the_leader_please_choose_your_te.message: You are the leader. Please choose your team.

intercepted_number_total_number_messages.message: { intercepted, number } / { total, number } messages intercepted

used_in_choosing_proper_he_she_they_in_g.message: Used in choosing proper he / she / they in game text.

are_you_sure_you_want_to_remove_name_6e5.message: Are you sure you want to remove { name }?

this_game_requires_at_least_4_players_c2.message: This game requires at least 4 players.

to_prove_your_innocence_you_were_thrown_.message:
To prove your innocence, you were thrown into the
              lake. You struggled and flailed, but you quickly sank into water
              and drowned. After your body was pulled from the lake, you were
              given a proper christian burial.

as_a_trial_you_all_tossed_name_into_the_.message:
As a trial, you all tossed { name } into the lake.
            { name } struggled and flailed, but quickly sank into water and
            drowned. After the body was pulled from the lake, you gave { name }
            a proper christian burial.

to_prove_your_innocence_you_were_thrown_.message:
To prove your innocence, you were thrown into the
            lake. You struggled and flailed, and managed to stay afloat. In
            horror, the others watched you exert inhuman power in returning to
            the shore.

as_a_trial_you_all_tossed_name_into_the_.message:
As a trial, you all tossed { name } into the lake.
            { name } struggled and flailed, and managed to stay afloat. In
            horror, you watched the inhuman power { name } exerted to return to
            the shore.

does_this_prove_to_you_that_name_is_a_wi.message:
Does this prove to you that { name } is a witch,
                and should now be executed?

your_community_will_now_decide_your_fate.message:
Your community will now decide your fate. Having
              survived the trial, they undoubtedly will assume you are a witch.

who_are_the_devil_s_agents_among_you_con.message:
Who are the devilâ€™s agents among you? Convince your
      fellows of your innocence to survive, or prove your worth through a
      tortuous trial. Purge your community of the evil ones, or be the witch
      that destroys your enemies.

witch_hunt_requires_at_least_4_players_7.message: Witch Hunt requires at least 4 players.

the_game_takes_place_over_a_series_of_da.message:
The game takes place over a series of days and nights.
        Each night the witches conspire to curse their persecutors, while the
        pure in heart sleep, and the curious try to discover their peers.

in_the_morning_you_find_out_who_has_been.message:
In the morning you find out who has been killed by the
        witches, and vote on a player to put on trial. The trial will likely
        kill an innocent person, but it is necessary to uncover the witches.
        If the player survives the trial, they have proven their wickedness.
        Vote again to execute them.

is_your_community_safe_at_last_only_if_e.message:
Is your community safe at last? Only if everyone agrees
        can the trials end, and the result be revealed.

the_game_is_set_in_a_location_similar_to.message:
The game is set in a location similar to North America
        during the early modern period. While the scenarios depicted in this
        game are fictional, an estimated 40,000 people were executed in real
        witch trials across Europe and in North America. Remember to be
        patient and tolerant with each other outside of the game, and that a
        bigot hunt is no different from a witch hunt.

surviving_the_trial_only_further_convinc.message:
Surviving the trial only further convinced your
                community of your wickedness. Your soaked clothing continued to
                drip long after you strangled on the gallows. When they cut you
                down, your body was tossed into an open pit outside town.

Surviving the trial only further convinced everyone
              of { name }â€™s wickedness. { name }â€™s soaked clothing continued to
              drip long after strangling on the gallows. When { name } was cut
              down, the body was tossed into an open pit outside town.

though_you_survived_the_trial_your_strug.message:
Though you survived the trial, your struggle was
              enough to convince your fellows of your innocence... for now.

though_name_survived_the_trial_the_strug.message:
Though { name } survived the trial, the struggle was
              enough to convince everyone of { name }â€™s innocence... for now.

you_have_found_that_you_have_uncanny_pow.message:
You have found that you have uncanny powers to influence
        those around you, and can cause occurrences inexplicable to ordinary
        understanding. In order to survive, you must use this power to stop
        those who would destroy you.

each_night_you_will_choose_with_your_coh.message:
Each night you will choose with your cohorts whom you
        must curse, so that you may live.

each_day_you_will_defend_your_friends_ag.message:
Each day you will defend your friends against the deadly
        trails, but do not let the commoners know that you are a witch, or who
        your fellow witches are.

a_swift_end_to_the_trials_is_your_safest.message: A swift end to the trials is your safest course.

you_are_godly_and_kind_your_hard_work_wi.message:
You are godly and kind. Your hard work will ensure your
        place in heaven, but the Devil is among your community and will surely
        destroy everything you love, and take away your heavenly reward, unless
        you discover and destroy his agents.

each_night_you_can_choose_to_sleep_or_to.message:
Each night you can choose to sleep, or to follow a member
        of your community. Following can help you find who is a witch, but you
        may look a little suspicious in the process.

each_day_you_will_put_to_trial_the_perso.message:
Each day you will put to trial the person you most think
        to be a witch. If they survive the trial, it is surely through the evil
        oneâ€™s power, and they must be executed immediately.

an_early_ending_to_the_trials_may_leave_.message:
An early ending to the trials may leave your enemies a
        chance to drag you down to hell.

you_stayed_up_for_a_little_while_but_nam.message:
You stayed up for a little while, but { name } just went
        to sleep as usual, and then, so did you.

shortly_after_you_retired_to_your_bed_a_.message:
Shortly after you retired to your bed, a sudden
                pain flashed in your shoulder and chest. After a few moments
                your life came to an end.

late_this_morning_someone_realized_name_.message:
Late this morning someone realized { name } wasnâ€™t
              about the usual tasks. { name } was quickly found to be dead in
              bed.

you_woke_this_morning_with_a_terrible_he.message:
You woke this morning with a terrible headache
                and fever. You tried to get out of bed but felt so dizzy you
                immediately returned to bed.

late_this_morning_someone_realized_name_.message:
Late this morning someone realized { name } wasnâ€™t
              about the usual tasks. { name } was then found to be terribly ill
              in bed.

whom_shall_be_tried_for_this_tragedy_f07.message: Whom shall be tried for this tragedy?

you_all_went_about_their_usual_tasks_thi.message:
You all went about their usual tasks this morning.
              Everyone was accounted for.
